question: "Chha Mana Atha Gunta" a famous Odia novel depicts which of the following incidents?
option3: Condition of the education system of Odisha
explanation: \"Chha Mana Atha Gunta\" or Six acres and a third was written by Fakir Mohan Senapati. The main depiction of this novel is Exploitation by a landlord. A film directed by Parbati Ghose was also released in 1986 on that topic.
